name: Triple Berry Sorbet
author: larkspur
summary: This tart, refreshing sorbet makes a great light dessert!
directions: Bring the sugar and water to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat
When the sugar is dissolved, stir in the cranberries, and cook and stir for 5 minutes
Add the raspberries, and simmer for 5 more minutes, until the raspberries have softened and the cranberries have popped
Strain the mixture through a sieve or strainer, discard the pulp, and refrigerate the mixture for 2 hours
Mix in the cherry juice, lime juice, and orange juice concentrate, and pour the mixture into an ice cream maker
Pack the sorbet into a freezer container and freeze for about 2 hours, until the sorbet is firm
Remove from the freezer about 10 minutes before serving
